ways_to_give.title: sponsor a water project
ways_to_give.body: transform an entire community or school with a gift of $10,000 or more

ways_to_give.title: honor someoone special
ways_to_give.body: honor or remember someone special by making a gift in their name

ways_to_give.title: legacy giving
ways_to_give.body: join us in shaping the future and making clean water a part of your lasting legacy

ways_to_give.title: give by check or stock
ways_to_give.body: we also accept donations by check, stock, money order, and wire transfer

ways_to_give.title: donate with cryptocurrency
ways_to_give.body: we currently accept bitcoin, ether, litecoin, bitcoin cash, Zcash, filecoin, and dogecoin

ways_to_give.title: give to the bitcoin water trust
ways_to_give.body: our exponential growth fund will hold all donated bitcoins unrtil at least 2025
